'''''ósanwe''''' is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "interchange of thought".<ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 183</ref>

''Ósanwe'' is an inherent ability that all [[Ainur]] and [[Incarnates]] possess, however the power is lessened by having a body or ''[[hröa]]'', so it is generally weaker for [[Elves]] and especially for [[Men]]. All minds are "equal in status, though they differ in capacity and strength." Language can also become an impediment to the development of ''ósanwe'', since it is easier for Incarnates to use which can lead to neglect.  

A mind can only be communicated to with ''ósanwe'' if it is open (''sanwe-latya'', "thought opening, telepathy"). Any mind can be willed closed, and this is a barrier that cannot be overcome by anything or anyone, not even by [[Melkor]] applying all his power and will. 

The ability for communication can be strengthened through various means: from affinity between the persons communicating, urgency on the part of the person sending the thought, or their authority lending effectiveness, allowing thought to pass through bodies more easily.<ref>{{NM|P2ix}}</ref> 

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2001: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'':'''
:When the [[Fellowship of the Ring]] arrives in [[Caras Galadhon]], [[Galadriel]] telepathically talks to them about the fate of [[Gandalf]] and specifically greets [[Frodo]]. She talks to the latter again in the same way about the [[One Ring]] after he looked into the [[Mirror of Galadriel]].
'''2002: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'':'''
:Before the beginning of the [[Battle of the Hornburg]], Galadriel and [[Elrond]] have a long-distance communication about the danger awaiting [[Aragorn]] and the others there, and send a troop of Elves to fight with them.
'''2003: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'':'''
:When [[Pippin]] looks into the palantír of Isengard, he is able to close off his mind to Sauron and prevent any information about the One Ring from reaching him.
'''2012: ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'':'''
:During the meeting of the [[White Council]] at [[Rivendell]] Galadriel greets [[Gandalf]] telepathically, and they continue to communicate while [[Saruman]] is talking.
